game.name: RUNNER RTX
game.shortDescription: RUNNER RTX is a classic runner game with a procedurally generated world but with cinematic graphics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: RUNNER RTX is a classic runner game with a procedurally generated world but with cinematic graphics.

reviewHighlights.text: way to expensive, very basic game. if you have played 2-3 min you have seen it all
This game is so bad. I could make it in less than a day on unreal engine. They could have at least changed the physics from the default template contr...
